intro: Talinum mengesii, commonly known as the red-rooted spider flower, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. Talinum mengesii is often found in moist, sunny habitats such as riverbanks and wetlands. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardeners interested in native plants.
